title: Haunted Zyra Skin has lost all its vFX
body:
Being a Zyra main I noticed this quickly but haven't seen any fixes to it, maybe I am one of the few who noticed? 

Specifically:

Haunted Zyra Auto Attacks no longer glow like they sued to, and plants no longer have glowing attacks, they just look like regular zyra, which is sad :(

Riot please fix this in the spirit of Halloween! :)

replies.body:
Hey Zaunji, 

Haunted Zyra's auto attacks and Thorn Spitter were fixed in Patch 5.21. They should be working properly in the game right now. ^-^
Oh yayyyy!!! :) cool thank you so much <3
